Reviews.Title: Great so far but specs are not correct.
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Adams "mja"
Reviews.Content: So far, this is a nice machine. However, the specs on the disc are not correct on the listing. Here is what the disc actually is:Hitachi Z5K500 SpecsInterface: SATA 3GbpsCapacity: 500GBSector Size: 4K Advanced FormatAreal Density (max): 636 Gbit/sq. in.Data Buffer: 8MBRotational Speed: 5400RPMLatency (average): 5.5 msSeek Time (average/typical read): 13 msPhysical Height: 7mmWeight: 95gPower consumption (W):Startup peak (max): 4.5Seek (average): 1.8Read/Write (average): 1.6Performance Idle (average): 1.5Active Idle (average): 0.8Low Power Idle (average): 0.55Standby (average): 0.2Sleep: 0.1

Reviews.Title: Nice Hardware, wished for better Software
Reviews.Author: Brittny Piper
Reviews.Content: Laptop has been great, only real issue is that is switches boot options at times and has difficulty booting up. Easily fixed. Macafee is a serious nuisance as always.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Xiao
Reviews.Content: I have been using this laptop for half a year. The best thing about it is it does not get hot. It also runs fast, and rarely crashes.The screen is nice and big.Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Diego Guardado
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer, it worth every penny. Just the keyboard sounds a little weird, but everithing else is just great.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: lshelm
Reviews.Content: I needed a new computer and previously purchased an Asus and was very happy with it.  So  I decided to try another.  I am totally happy with my purchase.  It fulfills all my requirements and needs.

Reviews.Title: Fast, reliable
Reviews.Author: B. Chavez
Reviews.Content: The first laptop I was sent did not have an Operating System installed...The second laptop did and it is very fast and reliable. I'm impressed so far.Pros:Sleek DesignVery fastAmazing price1-year warrantyCons:Keyboard not backlitAsus customer support- unless you want to wait on the phone between 8am and 4pm...

Reviews.Title: Very thrilled with my purchase!
Reviews.Author: Chris Macksey
Reviews.Content: The computer was everything I expected and more. I felt I got great value for my purchase and I will definitely be back for future purchases.

Reviews.Title: Its beautiful!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris Pham
Reviews.Content: It looks better than I expected. i7 is very fast. Window 8 is a bit complecated, guess I'll get used to it in a few days.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7 3610QM 2.3 GHz
4 GB SDRAM
500 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive, 0 GB Solid-State Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Asus K55A-DH71 15.6-Inch Laptop
